title: Realm of Darkness
description: When darkness falls, beware of the creatures that come out to play...Fall under their spell over and over again in this ultimate paranormal and fantasy romance boxset! Over 30 full-length novels with heart-melting heroes and devastating anti-heroes, full of romance, magic, mystery, and adventure can be yours for an insanely low price.Ready to be swept away? Your book boyfriends are waitingâ€¦ Enemies-to-lovers, alphas, fae, werewolves, dragons, shapeshifters, vampires, gods, angels, demons, and more: with novels ranging from sweet to spicy, there's a flavor to sate your every craving.You won't find these exclusive novels anywhere else, so don't miss your chance. Over ten thousand pages by New York Times, USA Today, and International bestselling authors and at less than three cents per book, this collection is a steal, but only for a limited time. Grab it today before it's gone forever...
author: J.A. Culican
